name: commonproject
description: Student project with Spring, Ionic, and MySQL

scripts.w:install: start /D .\frontend npm i | start /D .\backend mvn install
scripts.w:launch: start /D .\frontend ionic serve | start /D .\backend mvn spring-boot:run
scripts.update-packages: npm run tab:npm-i && npm run tab:mvn-i
scripts.update-launch: npm run update-packages| sleep 40; npm run start
